actions.recommendation: Regular screening of any skin lesions is recommended - ‘Mole Mapping’ can be done with a Dermatologist. If any changes in size/ shape/ colour of a skin mark - to seek medical review.

As you get older (>40 years) - routine screening becomes important to help early detection & management of any irregularities. In males, this means regular prostate examinations and PSA blood levels. This is something to bear in mind in the next few years.

Overall you have a good baseline. There were a few areas that we identified that can be optimised in order to improve your current general health as well as prevent future chronic illness. Reducing your sugar intake and stress management can make a big difference.
